name: Limbo (itch) (alvarp7)
description:
This short graphic adventure was made as a university project. It is a prototype that could be taken farther. Maybe, in the future, there will be more interactions or worlds added to it.

It was created using Unity, and many of the assets have been obtained from the Unity Asset Store. Sounds are free copyright (Creative Commons 0) and were downloaded from freesound.org.

Enjoy the experience!
